WorkItem.ClosedComment:
PHPExcel PEAR package has to be downloaded from CodePlex first: http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=10713

Afterwards, the following command can be issued:
pear install /path/to/downloaded/package/PHPExcel.tgz
WorkItem.Description:
